  • Method Details

    • nextPhaseSetUp

      public void nextPhaseSetUp()
      Game setup. This function relies on Gods and Workers being initialized to null. END will be seen as the first state for every player. Will set the phase to CHOOSE_WORKER when finished. Also initialize athena and hera flag in gods.

    • nextPhaseGame

      public void nextPhaseGame()
      Game phase switcher, also initialize the turn for gods. When END is seen it has to be used one more time.

    • setPlayerNumber

      public void setPlayerNumber​(int num)
      Used to set number of players
      Parameters:
      num - number of players

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer​(Player VamosAllaPlayer)
      this function initialize the turn of the player also reset the athena moveup if athena is in game
      Parameters:
      VamosAllaPlayer - i Choose you VAMOSALLAPLAYER!
